Package com.Game.model

Class Map

java.lang.Object
com.Game.model.Map
public class Map extends Object
Represents a game map consisting of territories and continents. Provides methods to manage territories, neighbors, continents, and save the map to a file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Map()
    Default constructor that initializes an empty map with no territories or continents.
    Map(Map p_map)
    Copy constructor that creates a deep copy of the provided map.

      Default constructor that initializes an empty map with no territories or continents.

    • Map

      Copy constructor that creates a deep copy of the provided map.
      Parameters:
      p_map - The map to copy.

  • Method Details

    • getTerritoryList

      public List<Territory> getTerritoryList()
      Retrieves the list of territories in the map.
      Returns:
      A list of territories.

    • setTerritoryList

      public void setTerritoryList(List<Territory> p_territoryList)
      Sets the territory list.
      Parameters:
      p_territoryList - The territory list to set.

    • getContinents

      public Map<String,Integer> getContinents()
      Gets the continents map.
      Returns:
      The map of continents to their control values.

    • addTerritory

      public void addTerritory(Territory p_newTerritory)
      Adds a new territory to the map. Ensures that each territory has a unique name.
      Parameters:
      p_newTerritory - The territory to be added.

    • getTerritoryByName

      public Territory getTerritoryByName(String p_name)
      Retrieves a territory by its name.
      Parameters:
      p_name - The name of the territory.
      Returns:
      The territory if found, otherwise null.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the map, listing all territories.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string containing the map details.

    • addContinent

      public void addContinent(String p_continentID, int p_continentValue)
      Adds a continent with a given ID and value.
      Parameters:
      p_continentID - The unique identifier for the continent.
      p_continentValue - The value associated with the continent.

    • removeContinent

      public void removeContinent(String p_continentID)
      Removes a continent and all territories associated with it.
      Parameters:
      p_continentID - The ID of the continent to remove.

    • addCountry

      public void addCountry(String p_countryID, String p_continentID)
      Adds a country (territory) to a continent if the continent exists.
      Parameters:
      p_countryID - The name of the country.
      p_continentID - The ID of the continent the country belongs to.

    • removeCountry

      public void removeCountry(String p_countryID)
      Removes a country (territory) from the map.
      Parameters:
      p_countryID - The name of the country to remove.

    • addNeighbor

      public void addNeighbor(String p_countryID, String p_neighborCountryID)
      Adds a neighboring relationship between two territories.
      Parameters:
      p_countryID - The ID of the country.
      p_neighborCountryID - The ID of the neighboring country.

    • removeNeighbor

      public void removeNeighbor(String p_countryID, String p_neighborCountryID)
      Removes a neighboring relationship between two territories.
      Parameters:
      p_countryID - The ID of the country.
      p_neighborCountryID - The ID of the neighboring country.

    • setContinents

      public void setContinents(Map<String,Integer> p_continents)
      Sets the continents of the map.
      Parameters:
      p_continents - A map of continent IDs to their corresponding values.

    • saveToFile

      public void saveToFile(String p_filePath)
      Saves the map structure to a file in a specific format. The file includes continents, countries, and their neighboring relationships.
      Parameters:
      p_filePath - The path to the file where the map should be saved.

    • mapValidation

      public boolean mapValidation()
      Validates if the entire map is a connected graph.
      Returns:
      true if the map is connected, otherwise false.

    • continentValidation

      public boolean continentValidation()
      Validates if each continent in the map is a connected subgraph.
      Returns:
      true if all continents are connected subgraphs, otherwise false.
